driveSystems
Class SwerveDrive.AngularMovement

java.lang.Object
  driveSystems.SwerveDrive.AngularMovement
Enclosing class:
SwerveDrive
protected static class SwerveDrive.AngularMovement
extends java.lang.Object

An angular movement designed for the motors controlling the direction of the wheels.

Author:
Colin Poler

Field Summary

          The angle change for this move.
protected  int direction
